verses.verse: This <S%H2088><s%> is the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H121>Adam.<s%> In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> in the <S%H1823>likeness<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> he him;
